title: David Stewart: The Mentor of Might

story.text: David Stewart started his week as usual, teaching at the local community center, unaware that a mysterious ancient artifact delivered that morning would soon change his life.
While organizing old books in a storage room, David discovered a glowing amulet. When he touched it, he felt a surge of energy, granting him the power to enhance others' abilities.
Testing his newfound powers, David started mentoring a struggling student with math. Miraculously, the student's understanding deepened rapidly under David’s guidance.
News of his student’s sudden proficiency spread. More students began seeking David's help, and he realized that he could use his powers to help them achieve their potential.
David was approached by professionals and athletes, all seeking the edge his powers provided. He helped each, but stressed the importance of effort and ethics.
A moral dilemma presented itself: a shady businessman offered David a fortune to use his powers for unethical gains. David, staying true to his values, refused.
Reflecting on his week, David decided to dedicate his abilities to teach and uplift the community, officially taking up the mantle of The Mentor of Might.

ending: Thus, David Stewart learned that true power lies in empowering others.
moral: The greatest strength one can have is the ability to enhance the strength in others.
